Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add/subtract EP for the whole guild.\n|c00FF0000Warning: This may cause a brief lag spike for players in large guilds. Use with caution.|r");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Decay/inflate the EPGP standings for the whole guild.\n|c00FF0000Warning: This may cause a brief lag spike for players in large guilds. Use with caution.|r");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Reset EPGP standings to default values for the whole guild.\n|c00FF0000Warning: This may cause a brief lag spike for players in large guilds. Use with caution.|r");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allows your addon to use the same settings as the select player.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allows you to create permanent overrides for item GP values.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Measure the attendance of your raid by creating snapshots.");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Loot Master Feature
Displays a window for players to respond to loot with the click of a button.
Enabling this option will force your raid to use this feature.

|c00FF0000This feature will not work for players not running CEPGP!|r");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Loot Master Feature\nAward a percentage of automatic EP gains (for example, from boss kills)\nto players on the standby list.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Loot Master Feature\nShare the standby list with all raid assists.");

FontString.name: CEPGP_options_standby_ep_offline
FontString.text: Award Standby EP to Offline Players:

FontString.name: CEPGP_options_standby_ep_accept_whispers
FontString.text: Allow Whispers for Standby EP Designation:

FontString.name: CEPGP_options_standby_ep_whisper_message
FontString.text: Whisper message for standby EP list:

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Award standby EP to offline players on the standby list.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allow players to whisper you a certain message to be automatically\nadded to the standby list");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Award standby EP to all players in the selected ranks.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add players to the standby EP list manually.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Moderate the standby list.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Add/subtract EP for players on the standby list.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Loot Master Feature\nAdjust the number of decimal places item GP values round to.\nValid range: 0-2");

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Forces players below your rank that have the 'Allowed Forced Synchronisation From Rank'\nsetting enabled to use the same settings as your addon.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Allows the selected rank or higher to force your addon to use the same configuration as theirs.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Automatically pass on items when using the loot GUI if you cannot equip the item.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Loot Master Feature\nAllow all raid members to view the loot distribution window, not just raid assists.");

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_guild_log_restore_desc:SetText("Select the record you would like to restore

|c00FF0000Make sure this is what you want to do.
This will overwrite ALL current guild EPGP
standings with the record.");

self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_settings_import_desc:SetText("Enter the name of the player
you would like to import settings from.
self will overwrite all of your existing settings.

Player must be in your guild or raid group");
self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); CEPGP_override_desc:SetText("This window allows your to permanently\n(or until the log is removed), override the gp\nvalue of an item to what ever you specify");

FontString.name: CEPGP_traffic_desc
FontString.text: A record of the EPGP traffic in your guild

FontString.name: CEPGP_debuginfo_text
FontString.text: Copy and paste this string into your github report

Scripts.OnLoad:
CEPGP_notice_text:SetText("Thank you for choosing to use Classic EPGP!
I hope that you enjoy using this addon and I hope that it helps your guild
how ever you end up using it.

Just one thing you should know - this addon needs to have
full control over your officer notes to maintain EPGP records.
Meaning, as this addon attempts to maintain your records, it will overwrite
any existing officer notes. Similarly, if you want your guild members to
be able to see their EP and GP values, they need to be able to see
officer notes too. Essentially, the addon can only see what you can see.

self addon is designed and really does work best if your
your whole guild (or at least your raid team) has it installed.
self will provide you with functions like loot council support
and being able to see what items your raid members are wearing
when you're distributing items.

I hope you enjoy using the addon and if you have any feature requests or
find a bug, please submit a ticket on the addon GitHub page:
github.com/Alumian/CEPGP-Retail"); CEPGP_notice_frame:SetWidth(CEPGP_notice_text:GetStringWidth()+25);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Records a snapshot of the players currently in your raid group.");
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Filters the records to show you only the players\nthat were present in the selected snapshot.");

Scripts.OnShow: local total = CEPGP_ntgetn(CEPGP_raid_logs); self:SetText("Total Snapshots Recorded: " .. total);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText("Exports guild EPGP standings in a CSV format.");

Scripts.OnLoad: CEPGP_confirmation_desc:SetText("Would you like to use CEPGP for this raid?");

CEPGP_notice_desc:SetText("|c00FF0000Classic EPGP Important Notice|r
Version 1.12.0 contains major updates which
render previous versions of CEPGP incompatible.

Please ensure that your guild members update to
version 1.12.0 to avoid unexpected results.");
